section.p: To renounce the worship of Alvir and Valmir, you must pay 30 Shards in compensation to the priesthood. A merchant standing beside you catches your arm and shakes his head. ‘If you want my advice, you’ll stay an initiate. I left the temple, and the following week half my fleet was wrecked in a storm off Knucklebones Point!’

Do you want to reconsider?
If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 30 Shards and delete Alvir and Valmir from the God box on your Adventure Sheet.
